an4.232:4.1: “Mendicants, I declare these four kinds of deeds, having realized them with my own insight.
an4.232:4.3: There’s dark deeds with dark results.
an4.232:4.4: There’s bright deeds with bright results.
an4.232:4.5: There’s dark and bright deeds with dark and bright results.
an4.232:4.6: There’s neither dark nor bright deeds with neither dark nor bright results, which lead to the end of deeds.
an4.232:4.7: These are the four kinds of deeds that I declare, having realized them with my own insight.”
